title: Architectural Tiles, "proSolve 370e", 2009
medium: Recycled ABS plastic with photocatalytic titanium dioxide coating
provenance: Received directly from the manufacturer for the National Design Triennial, 2010.
dimensions:
Narrow tiles (each tile): H x W x D: 47.9 x 15.8 x 12.7 cm (18 7/8 x 6 1/4 x 5 in.)
Wide tiles (each tile): H x W x D: 41 x 29.9 x 12.7 cm (16 1/8 x 11 3/4 x 5 in.)
description: Modular open-work tile structure made of recycled plastic and coated with titanium dioxide. Designed as a functional facade element to reduce air pollution.

tombstone.epitaph:
Architectural Tiles, "proSolve 370e", 2009.
2009. Recycled ABS plastic with photocatalytic titanium dioxide coating. Gift of Elegant Embellishments. 2011-29-1/44.
